official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim May 1, 1979, as International Unalienable Rights Day.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating May 1, 1979, as "International Unalienable Rights Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim May 1, 1979, as International Unalienable Rights Day.
